mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_phonenumber, member_birth FROM tbl_member limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, DATE_FORMAT(notice_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS notice_register_date, DATE_FORMAT(notice_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS notice_update_date from tbl_notice limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, DATE_FORMAT(notice_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS notice_register_date, DATE_FORMAT(notice_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS notice_update_date from tbl_notice where notice_id = #{noticeId}

select board_id, m.member_id, member_name, board_title, board_content, DATE_FORMAT(board_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_register_date, DATE_FORMAT(board_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_update_date, board_read_count from tbl_board_saving s join tbl_member m on s.member_id = m.member_id limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select board_id, m.member_id, member_name, board_title, board_content, DATE_FORMAT(board_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_register_date, DATE_FORMAT(board_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_update_date, board_read_count from tbl_board_saving s join tbl_member m on s.member_id = m.member_id and board_id = #{boardId}

select board_id, m.member_id, member_name, board_title, board_content, DATE_FORMAT(board_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_register_date, DATE_FORMAT(board_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_update_date, board_read_count from tbl_board_free f join tbl_member m on f.member_id = m.member_id limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select board_id, m.member_id, member_name, board_title, board_content, DATE_FORMAT(board_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_register_date, DATE_FORMAT(board_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_update_date, board_read_count from tbl_board_free f join tbl_member m on f.member_id = m.member_id and board_id = #{boardId}
select banner_id, banner_system_name, banner_original_name, DATE_FORMAT(banner_register_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS banner_register_date, banner_status from tbl_banner limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select member_id, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_nickname, member_phonenumber, member_birth, (select count(board_id) FROM goldenpig.tbl_board where member_id = ${memberID}) from tbl_member
